title: Shopee Marketing Shipping Fee Promotion Detailed Overview Daily Report
description: Daily report providing a detailed overview of a Shopee marketing shipping fee promotion

Promotion_Name.description: Name of the shipping fee promotion

Status.description: Current status of the promotion (e.g., Promosi Telah Berakhir)

Promotion_Period.description: Duration of the promotion period (start - end)

Promotion_Rule.description: Specific rule or condition of the promotion (e.g., Beli 200.000, Gratis Ongkir sebesar 10.000)

Budget.description: Total budget for the Promotion Name

Sales_Placed_Order.description: Total sales from placed orders during the promotion

Sales.description: Total Sales for the Promotion Name

Orders_Placed_Order.description: Total orders placed during the promotion

Orders.description: Total orders generated by the promotion

Buyers_Placed_Order.description: Number of unique buyers who placed orders during the promotion

Buyers.description: Total number of unique buyers who participated in the promotion

Sales_Per_Buyer_Placed_Order.description: Average sales per buyer from placed orders during the promotion

Sales_Per_Buyer.description: Total Sales Per buyer for the Promotion Name

Shipping_Cost_Placed_Order.description: Total shipping cost from placed orders during the promotion

Shipping_Cost.description: Total Shipping Cost for the Promotion Name

ROI_Placed_Order.description: Return on Investment (ROI) percentage calculated from placed orders (e.g., "7.075,46%")

ROI.description: Return on Investment (ROI) value for the entire promotion
